title: Yelp Chatbot on Streamlit
description: LLM RAG chatbot that queries structured and unstructured data on Yelp datasets with OpenAI and GraphQL. Based on LangChain, and hosted on Streamlit. FastAPI backend. Also integrates a geodistancing API for routing information

title: SQL Chatbot
description: An LLM chatbot based on LangChain and OpenAI, to query an AWS-hosted SQL server. Hosted on Streamlit. Also implemented with Chainlit

title: Automated Bank Loan Decision Making Bot
description: XGBoost binary classifier, with AWS cloud deployment

title: TraderBot
description: Using Deep Learning and Reinforcement Learning for Stock Prediction and Trading

title: Portfolio Website on Streamlit(a.k.a here ðŸ˜‚)
description: Amongst other packages and tools, this app uses the LLama-Index query engine with OpenAI-based for document querying

title: Yelp Review Study
description: Data collection, experimentation and analysis for Originality.ai's AI Content detector

title: Fact Checker Study
description: A multi-part data science study: building 5 LLM Claims Datasets, assessing the performance of an NLP-based fact checker tool for Originality.ai

title: Detecting Duplicate Quora Questions
description: Using LSTM-based architecture, with transfer learning from Tensorflow Hub's Universal Sentence Encoder for a binary classifier

title: USA Wildlife Air Strikes
description: Data Visualizations and Dashboards with Tableau

title: Ted Talk Recommender Engine
description: Using FAISS Semantic search and HuggingFace T5 transformers to query a Ted Talk transcript database for recommendations based on user interests. Multi-discplinary team effort
